test-set.name: math-pow
test-set.description: Tests for the math:pow function introduced in XPath 3.0

test-case.name: math-pow-001
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments () and 93.7

test-case.name: math-pow-002
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 2 and 3

test-case.name: math-pow-003
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments -2 and 3

test-case.name: math-pow-004
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments -2 and -3

test-case.name: math-pow-005
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 2 and 0

test-case.name: math-pow-006
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 0 and 0

test-case.name: math-pow-007
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments xs:double('INF') and 0

test-case.name: math-pow-008
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments xs:double('NaN') and 0

test-case.name: math-pow-009
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments -math:pi() and 0

test-case.name: math-pow-010
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 0e0 and 3

test-case.name: math-pow-011
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 0e0 and 4

test-case.name: math-pow-012
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments -0e0 and 3

test-case.name: math-pow-013
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 0 and 4

test-case.name: math-pow-014
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 0e0 and -3

test-case.name: math-pow-015
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 0e0 and -4

test-case.name: math-pow-016
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments -0e0 and -3

test-case.name: math-pow-017
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 0 and -4

test-case.name: math-pow-018
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 16 and 0.5e0

test-case.name: math-pow-019
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 16 and 0.25e0

test-case.name: math-pow-020
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 0e0 and -3.0e0

test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments -0e0 and -3.0e0

test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 0e0 and -3.1e0

test-case.name: math-pow-023
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments -0e0 and -3.1e0

test-case.name: math-pow-024
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 0e0 3.0e0

test-case.name: math-pow-025
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments -0e0 and 3.0e0

test-case.name: math-pow-026
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 0e0 3.1e0

test-case.name: math-pow-027
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments -0e0 and 3.1e0

test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments -1 and xs:double('INF')

test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments -1 and xs:double('-INF')

test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 1 and xs:double('INF')

test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments 1 and xs:double('NaN')

test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:pow() with the arguments -2.5 and 2.0000001
